Translations.Text: Kazhu, "ya buv nadykhnutyy shcho hrupa jinns poslukhala, todi skazala, `we pochuly dyvovyzhnyy Quran
it dovidnyky do righteousness, ta my viryly v tse; my nikoly ne vstanovymo budʹ-yakykh idoliv bilya nashoho Lorda
the Naybilʹsh Vysoko ye nash tilʹky Lord. Vin nikoly ne mav tovarysha, ne syna
it yavlyaye soboyu durni sered nas khto zvychayno vymovlyav take bez·hluzdya pro BOHA
we podumav shcho ni humans, ni jinns, mih mozhlyvo vymovyty brekhnyu pro BOHA
human istoty zvychayno shukaly potuzhnosti cherez jinn istot, ale vony tilʹky afflicted yim z duzhe bahato neshchastya
they podumani, tochno, yak vy podumaly,,, kotryy BOH poshle inshyy (kur'yer)
we torknuvsya nebes ta znaydenoho tse zapovnenyy z vartamy formidable ta projectiles
we zvychayno sydiv tam dlya toho, shchob rozvidnyk. Budʹ khto khto slukhaye peresliduyetʹsya potuzhnyy projectile
we ne mayutʹ ideyi yakshcho shchosʹ pohane spryamovane na meshkantsiv Zemli, abo yakshcho yikhniy Lord wills shchob vykupyty yikh
some nas ye spravedlyvi, ta deyakyy menshe, nizh spravedlyvi; my sliduyemo za riznomanitnymy shlyakhamy
we znaly povni dobre shcho my mozhemo nikoly ne utikty z BOHA na Zemli; my mozhemo nikoly ne utikty ta vtecha
when my pochuly kerivnytstvo, my vvazhaly tam. Budʹ khto khto virytʹ v yoho Lordu bude nikoly ne bo budʹ-yakoyi nespravedlyvosti, ne budʹ-yakoho affliction
among ny yavlyayutʹ soboyu submitters, ta sered nas yavlyayutʹ soboyu compromisers.' " Yak dlya tsykh khto pidkorylysya, vony ye na pravi shlyakh
Yak dlya compromisers, vony budutʹ palyvo dlya Gehenna
Yakshcho vony zalyshayutʹsya na pravi shlyakh, my blahoslovymo yikh z abundant vodoyu
My bezsumnivno vyprobuyemo yikh vsikh. Yak dlya nʹoho khto disregards povidomlennya yoho Lorda, Vin napravytʹ yoho kolysʹ zbilʹshuyuchyy retribution
mistsya obozhnyuyutʹ nalezhatʹ BOHU; ne zaklykayte budʹ khto shche bilya BOHA
Koly BOZHYY sluzhbovetsʹ zakhyshchav Yoho vyklyuchno, mayzhe usi banded razom protystavyty yoho
Kazhu, "ya obozhnyuyu tilʹky moho Lorda; YA nikoly ne vstanovlyuyu budʹ-yakykh idoliv bilya Yoho
Kazhu, "ya ne volodiyu potuzhnistyu zavdaty shkody vam, ne shchob keruvaty vamy
Kazhu, "Niyakyy kozhnyy ne mozhe zakhystyty meni z BOHA, ne mozhe ya znakhodzhu budʹ-yakyy inshyy prytulok bilya Yoho
ya dostavlyayu BOZHI vidozvy ta povidomlennya." Tsey khto ne pidkoryayutʹsya BOHU ta Yoho kur'yeru zaznayutʹ vohnyu Pekla, prychomu vony perebuyutʹ zavzhdy
Odnoho razu vony dyvlyatʹsya shcho ochikuye yikh, vony znaydutʹ khto ye diysno bilʹsh slabyy u potuzhnosti, ta menshe u chysli
Kazhu, "ya ne znayu yakshcho shcho obitsyayetʹsya do vy vidbudetesʹ skoro, abo yakshcho miy Lord zatrymaye tse dlya deyakoho chasu
Vin yavlyaye soboyu Knower maybutnʹoho; Vin ne vidkryvaye maybutnye do budʹ khto
Tilʹky do kur'yera shcho Vin vybyraye, Vin vidkryvayutʹ z mynuloho ta maybutnʹoho, spetsyfichnoyi novyny
Tse musytʹ perekonatysya shcho vony dostavyly yikhni povidomlennya Lorda. Vin znaye tsilkom yaki vony. Vin rozrakhuvav nomery vsikh rechey
O vy cloaked
Rozdumuyutʹ protyahom nochi, krim ridko
Polovyna tse, abo nevelykoho menshoho
Abo trokhy bilʹshe. Ta prochytanyy Quran vid korky do korky
My damo vam vazhke povidomlennya
mirkuvannya unochi ye bilʹshe efektyvne, ta bilʹshe spravedlyvyy
Vy mayete duzhe bahato chasu pid chas dnya dlya inshykh materialiv
Vy budete svyatkuvaty nazvu vashoho Lorda, shchob prybuty kolysʹ blyzhchi ta blyzhchyy yomu
Lord skhodu ta zakhodu; nemaye inshoho boha bilya Yoho. Vy musyte vybraty Yoho yak vash prybichnyk
Ta zalyshayutʹsya steadfast pered yikhnimy vyslovamy, ta disregard yim u krasyvomu sposobi
Ta dozvolenyy Meni mayutʹ spravu z rejectors, khto velykodushno buv blahoslovlenyy; tilʹky davaty yim nevelykyy chas
My mayemo suvori pokarannya, ta Peklo
Prodovolʹstvo shcho mozhe ledve buty kovtnute, ta bolisnyy retribution
denʹ prybude koly zemlya ta hory budutʹ tremtity, ta hory povernutʹsya u weightless kupa
My poslaly do vas kur'yer, tilʹky tomu shcho my poslaly Pharaoh kur'yer
Pharaoh ne pidkoryalysya kur'yeru ta, otzhe, my pokaraly yoho suvoro
Yakshcho vy disbelieve, yak vy mozhete unyknuty dnya tak strashne shcho tse robytʹ nemovlya sirym-haired
nebesa budutʹ shatter zvidty. Yoho obitsyanka ye virna
Tse ye reminder; whoever wills, dozvolyayutʹ yomu vybyrayutʹ shlyakh do yoho Lorda
